article.title: Insitu Receives $43 Million Unmanned Aircraft System Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Insitu, Inc., Bingen, Washington, was recently awarded a contract valued at more than $43 million for the engineering, manufacture and development of the small tactical unmanned aircraft system/Tier II unmanned aircraft system III for the U.S. Marine Corps.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
